name: Block! Triangle puzzle: Tangram
description:
💛🧡❤️️💚💙💜
Are you ready to build everything with rainbow triangles?
Arrange shapes made up of triangles to fill up all kinds of shapes and designs!
The possibilities are endless! :)
💛🧡❤️️💚💙💜

Block! Triangle Puzzle: Tangram is a block puzzle game that’s fun for all ages
👶👦👧👨👩👴👵

🌟HOW TO PLAY🌟
• Drag the geometric blocks into the board to fill it.
• Blocks can't be rotated.
• Don't worry! There are no time limits!

🌟FEATURES🌟
• BLOCK PUZZLE
- Smooth effects!

• TONS OF UNIQUE LEVELS
- Over 2000 puzzles, filled with fun and amazing challenges!

• EASY AND FUN PLAY
- Easy to learn and quick to play!

• NO TIME LIMIT
- Enjoy the game anytime, anywhere!

• NO WIFI? NO PROBLEM!
- You can play online and offline.

• STUNNING GRAPHICS
- Soothing sounds and gorgeous visual effects

• OPTIMIZED ANDROID & GOOGLE PLAY GAMES
- Designed for tablets & phones.
- Support both ARM & x86 DEVICES.
- ACHIEVEMENTS & LEADERBOARD from Google Play Games.

NOTES
• Block Triangle puzzle: Tangram supports both mobile phones & tablet PCs.
• Block Triangle puzzle: Tangram contains ads varying from banners, interstitials, videos to house ads.
• Block Triangle puzzle: Tangram is free to play, however, you may purchase AD FREE item.

• Block Triangle puzzle: Tangram requests following permissions.
- Read & Write contents of SD Card
- View network connections
- Full network access
- Receive data from the internet
- Google Play payment service
- View WLAN connections
- Prevent device from sleeping

** App Permissions **

[Required Permissions]
- None

[Optional Permissions]
- Photo / Media / File: required storage access permission to save game data

[Permission setting and withdrawal method]
- Android 6.0+: Device Settings> Application Management> Select App> Revoke Access
- Under Android 6.0: Can revoke access by deleting application
